mapper.select: insert into houses(phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, contact, img, img_count, status, avasrc) values(#{phone}, #{rent}, #{zulintype}, #{quyu}, #{ditie}, #{xiaoqu}, #{louceng}, #{fangjiantype}, #{dianti}, #{fangjiandaxiao}, #{sex}, #{fukuantype}, #{contact}, #{img}, #{img_count}, #{status}, #{avasrc})

select id, phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, contact, img, img_count, status, avasrc from houses limit #{itemcnt_start},#{itemcnt_end}
select id, phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, contact, img, img_count, status, avasrc from houses where id = #{id}
select id, phone, text, `date`, `name`, icon from tips limit #{itemcnt_start},#{itemcnt_end}
select id, phone, text, `date`, `name`, icon from tips where id = #{id}
select phone from user where nickName = #{nickName}
insert into user(phone, nickName, avatarUrl, province, city) values(#{phone}, #{nickName}, #{avatarUrl}, #{province}, #{city})
insert into tips(phone, text, `date`, `name`, icon) values(#{phone}, #{text}, #{date}, #{name}, #{icon})

update houses set rent = #{rent}, zulintype = #{zulintype}, quyu = #{quyu}, ditie = #{ditie}, xiaoqu = #{xiaoqu}, louceng = #{louceng}, fangjiantype = #{fangjiantype}, dianti = #{dianti}, fangjiandaxiao = #{fangjiandaxiao}, sex = #{sex}, fukuantype = #{fukuantype}, contact = #{contact}, img = #{img}, img_count = #{img_count} where phone = #{phone}
delete from houses where id = #{id} and phone = #{phone}
delete from tips where id = #{id} and phone = #{phone}

select id, phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, contact, img, img_count, status, avasrc from houses where quyu = #{quyu} limit #{itemcnt_start},#{itemcnt_end}

select id, phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, contact, img, img_count, status, avasrc from houses where fangjiantype = #{fangjiantype} limit #{itemcnt_start},#{itemcnt_end}

select id, phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, contact, img, img_count, status, avasrc from houses where zulintype = #{zulintype} limit #{itemcnt_start},#{itemcnt_end}

select id, phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, contact, img, img_count, status, avasrc from houses where rent >= #{price} limit #{itemcnt_start},#{itemcnt_end}

select id, phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, contact, img, img_count, status, avasrc from houses where rent >= #{price} and rent < #{price_end} limit #{itemcnt_start},#{itemcnt_end}
